Articles.Content:
Ok, kind of simple this build ANY aircraft from Planetside 2 then post pictures and the .craft file then we can all choose our favourites.

Simple.

Top 10:

Entrants:

Don't have any planetside 2 designs up, but here's my Phantasm design based off of the Phantasm from Planetside 1.

If you take a close look, you'll notice how much attention to detail there is. All the landing gear is in the correct places as well as the engines, even the rotary cannon from the early version Phantasm is present.

How did I not see this?! Loyalty until death!

Anyway, here's my Mosquito!

It's actually an early version of my VTOL I'll be posting on the spacecraft exchange soon.

Ok, I finshed my Galaxy. I doesnt have the back engines but is a VTOL and a stable plane, it can fly horizontal or Vertical.

Design [ATTACH=CONFIG]34986[/ATTACH] Takeoff [ATTACH=CONFIG]34987[/ATTACH]
